long_description: Protect your electronics and valuables in this set of 4 waterproof, flexible, strong yet lightweight LOKSAK storage bags. Set includes 4 bags, 1 each of the following sizes: 7 x 4.5 in., 6.75 x 6 in., 9 x 6 in. and 12 x 12 in. Each soft-sided bag prevents water and debris from damaging your equipment; flexible, shatterproof design holds oddly shaped items. Transparent material lets you easily view contents; cell phones, PDAs and other electronics can easily be used while in an Aloksak. Made with a patented, super-stretch, high-tenacity polymer to deliver extremely puncture-resistant, element-proof storage. Strong 6mm film is on par with PVC of the same thickness in terms of durability, but has a lower cold-crack tolerance than that of PVC. Easy-to-use closures are as simple as using a typical zip-closure type bag, but provide water-tight protection. Waterproof to 200 feet. Each bag weighs less than an ounce.
short_description: Protect your electronics and valuables in this set of 4 waterproof, flexible, strong yet lightweight LOKSAK storage bags.
